summary: A detective gets involved with the beautiful daughter of an old friend. The daughter turns out to be a jewel thief, who in turn gets the detective involved in a caper in Austria.
cast: Rock Hudson|Claudia Cardinale|Tomas Milian|Leon Askin|Ellen Corby|Walter Giller|Guido Alberti|Peter Dane|Tony Lo Bianco
title: Guapa, ardiente y peligrosa
